00034 /*
00035  * $Log$
00036  * Revision 1.2  2006/06/28 17:10:15  haraldkipp
00037  * Include more general header file for ARM.
00038  *
00039  * Revision 1.1  2006/03/02 19:43:11  haraldkipp
00040  * Added MCU specific hardware initialization routine. This should be done
00041  * later for all MCUs to avoid contaminating NutInit() with MCU specific
00042  * stuff. For the AT91 the spurious interrupt handler has been added,
00043  * which fixes SF 1440948.
00044  *
00045  */
00046 
00047 #include <arch/arm.h>
00048 #include <dev/irqreg.h>
00049 
00053 static void SpuriousEntry(void) __attribute__ ((naked));
00054 void SpuriousEntry(void)
00055 {
00056     IRQ_ENTRY();
00057     IRQ_EXIT();
00058 }
00059 
00063 void McuInit(void)
00064 {
00065     /* Set the vector. */
00066     outr(AIC_SPU, (unsigned int)SpuriousEntry);
00067 }
